title: Bosch to the rescue!
txt: My old dish washer was on it's last legs.  I needed a dishwasher that was efficent and quite. I chose the Bosch 500 series dishwasher.  I wanted a clean looking dishwasher with no handle so it would sit flush in my cabinet. I love the sleek look and quite dish washing cyles. Everthying fits well and everthing somes out sparkling clean. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Truly a leading edge/path breaking product
txt: Way ahead of the curve in terms of ease of use and in the way it delivers on its promises [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Innovative
txt:
First off stainless steel interior is the only way to go. This unit has many Useful designs. The tableware tray up top is nothing short of genius. It's deceiving in that it holds larger utensils like ladles and such.
The upper shelf is adjustable in heighth to allow for larger pots in the lower tray without affecting the wash function. Both shelves have adjustable prongs that fold down flat when not needed. The upper shelf has a fold down dohickie that holds stem ware in place. All the trays slide in-and-out easily.
There is a easy to reach filter unit in the bottom that strains out debris.
The controls are on the top of the door and when the wash cycle has been selected and the door closed, are tucked away. This unit is so quiet that they smartly installed a red light that projects a small beam onto the floor under the door to show it's running. 
At the end of the wash/dry cycle the door pops open about six inches to allow the condensation to escape. No water spots on pans and plastic. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Love my dishwasher
txt: I absolutely love my dishwasher.  I have already used most of the adjustable options.It is so quiet and the dishes are so clean.   Now if I could just find a load and unload option. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Nice dishwasher
txt:
Works great.
Like the adjustable pilots and rail [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Happy, finally
txt:
The instructions said “Scrap, do not rinse”. You gotta be kidding me. So I scraped and did not rinse and put them in the disheasher!!!
Cleanest dishes I have ever seen. I was so amazed and very pleased. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Works great, looks great!
txt: We purchased the Bosch 500 Series dishwasher in mid November. The delivery coordination was a little bumpy (not Bosch's fault) but it did finally arrive before Christmas. The unit is wonderful. It is quiet, cleans like a dream, and looks great in our kitchen. Our last dishwasher (not a Bosch) lasted 10 years. We bought a Bosch after reading many reviews and researching many different brands. We are hopeful this dishwasher will provide years of good service. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Great Dishwasher
txt: Love our new Bosch dishwasher ! It is very quiet & cleans everything, even tough cooked on foods. It has many great features & that the complete washing cycle is way shorter than our old dishwasher. Also, it is very water use efficient. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Wonderful
txt: We love our dishwasher [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Pete
txt:
As a contractor I have installed many of the bosch dishwashers. Bosch is the best to install easiest. The way they have the back leg adjustment in the front. There electial and hose set up from the back.
After purchasing one for my own house its so awesome. Its so quite if the light didnt shine on the floor you wont even know its on.

title: Game Changer
txt: Best dishwasher I have ever bought. It's extremely quiet and often times I need to check the light on the ground to see if it is running. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Best dishwasher
txt: I was skeptical on how quiet this machine was advertised to be but it exceeded my expectations.  This machine is quite and the dishes are spotless. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Best dishwasher
txt: I was skeptical on how quiet this machine was advertised to be but it exceeded my expectations.  This machine is quite and the dishes are spotless. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Love the 3rd drawer!
txt: This is our second Bosch. Although the first one we had seemed a little quieter, this new model has a lot of great new features. I would buy again. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Worth every penny
txt:
The quietest dishwasher I have ever had - washing options are great - epecially the air dry.

Customer service - had one question about washing options - was fantastic.   I would recommend this product without reservation. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: A great dishwasher
txt: So far a very good dishwasher

title: As expected, thank you!!
txt: My friend has the previous version and HATES it b/c her dishes came out wet, she was so skeptical when she saw mine and warned me. However, this updated version with the pop open door is amazing. Super happy with this purchase. I only gave it 4 stars b/c I don't give anything 5. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Very Quiet and efficient dishwasher
txt: This Bosch is very quiet.  It is easy to use, to load and holds a lot of dishes. It does a great job on the dishes. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Is it running?
txt:
After reading the reviews of several dishwashers I decided to step up to a Bosch since this was going to my first, and hopefully, my last dishwasher. The install was pretty straighforward for me but the surprise came when I put it through a test run. Being a little hard of hearing I couldn't hear it run at all. I installed it under the island I built in my kitchen and the back was still open so I could check for leaks. If it hadn't have been open I wouldn't have been able to feel the slight warmth coming off of the back of the unit. The little red light on the front of the unit that shines on the floor is supposed to let you know it's running but when you can't hear or feel anything you have to wonder.
The top 3rd tray is a bonus. I've removed the utensile holder and just use it for all the flatware. The second adjustable tray allows me to put larger items or even more plates on it. The adjustable tines in the trays allows you to adjust the spacing to suit your own needs as well. The auto air dry feature is also a plus since the unit opens automatically when the wash cycle is done. Even when set to half load my dishes come out clean as can be. 
I am very pleased with this dishwasher and would buy it again if needed! Kudos to Bosch for making a quiet userfriendy dishwasher packed with these features. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Greatest Dishwasher Ever
txt: We are extremely happy with our purchase of  our Bosch Dishwasher.  It is the quietest, most efficient dishwasher we have ever owned.  The feature that automatically opens the door is wonderful we never have to wonder if a cycle is complete.  We would recommend this appliance to anyone looking for the best on the market. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Amazing appliance!
txt: This dishwasher has truly exceeded all our expectations.  It is supremely quiet, wonderfully efficient, and it cleans our dishes perfectly.  It is sleek and stylish and would fit well into any kitchen.  The Bosch 500 series does not disappoint!  I would highly recommed this dishwasher to anyone.  Thank you, Bosch, for making such an amazing appliance! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: New Dishwasher
txt: Installation was very easy. Can hardly hear it running. Thanks for the red light to let you know it is running. We have struggled with getting plastic items dry but we are learning the personality of this machine and slowly getting it figured out to meet our expectations. The ability to pause and restart is a little confusing but are also getting it figured out. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: My new dishwasher
txt:
It’s very good so far still pretty new to use and we’re still getting used to the different wash and dry cycles. It was alittle pricey but so far worth the cost 
Keep up the good work [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Great dishwasher.
txt: This dishwasher has exceeded all expectations. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: cannot love my Bosch dishwasher more! It's the bes
txt: I absolutely love my dishwasher. It's almost totally silent. It cleans everything, including dried oatmeal, peanut butter on forks, avocado on a plate. I can't rave enough about it.

title: Excellent washer, clean dishes
txt: we have used this dishwasher for about 3 months. Very pleased, very quiet & thoroughly clean dishes. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Buy Bosch.
txt: Bought this dishwasher to replace a three year old GE dishwasher. This is the quietest, best cleaning dishwasher ever. You can barely hear it run, so it doesn't interrupt TV shows or conversations in our great room. It cleans our dishes very well also! Many people recommended this brand to us, and we are very pleased with our purchase. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: PERFECT
txt: Finally, a dishwasher that does what it is supposed to do - wash dishes!!!  The quality is definitely a plus in this very quiet appliance,  Bosch has even added a red light that shines on the floor to alert someone when it is functioning. I also love the flexible third rack and the fact that the middle one is adjustable that I can actually fit in my stemware.  All in all, it is a beautifully, well-thought out appliance.  I love my new Bosch. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: It's pretty good with a couple of exceptions
txt:
First the good. The dishwasher is quiet, it gets the dishes clean, and they get dry enough - as dry as any other dishwasher I've had. I've done it both ways - with the pop open door mehtod and without.  Not sure if I have a preference. You may have to sop up a little water on the tops of coffee cups before unloading - but that's not out of the ordinary.
Now the less good. The "resting" open door position (after it pops open to dry, or if you don't close it all the way) sticks out too far from the edge of the countertop for comfort.  It's in the way. The racks are not quite designed right.  It is hard to get wine glasses, and even regular glasses to fit firmly.  They tend to fall over after loading when closing the rack. And sometimes they just fall over on their own. Same issue with loading bowls, and even plates sometimes. Because of the design of the racks, there is a lot of wasted space.  For this reason, I wish I would have purchased a KitchenAid. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Whisper quiet
txt:
The shelving units are so well organized and the dishwasher is so quiet you don't even know it's on. He'd no idea the new dishwashers were so superior to my old one. 
Thank You Bosch !!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Love my new Bosch!
txt: Love how quiet my new dishwasher is. I especially like the silverware tray! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Bosch 500 Dishwasher
txt:
With great dread I began to shop for a new dishwasher when the 15 year old one died.  Shopping for appliances is my most unfavorite past time. Well I was in for a great surprise. I had seen the Bosch dishwashers at family homes in France.  I immediately recalled how quiet they were.  I liked the way the racks were arranged to recieve the dirty dishes.  So we immediatley decided that the replacement should be a Bosch.  I am so happy with our new Bosch 500 Series.  I like the new control panel that is hidden when closed.The third top rack is very user friendly for those special items.  Did I mention that my dishes seem cleaner?
I am very pleased in all ways with Bosch 500 dishwasher.  Thank you, Bosch for good design and engineering! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Love this dishwasher?!!
txt: Had this for a little over a month and it is the best dishwasher I have ever had. Love the 3 different levels. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Fantastic Dishwasher
txt: Our new bosh dishwasher is a great new addition to our kitchen, very quiet and looks great with our other stainless steal appliances! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Bosch Series 5 Dishwasher
txt: I love my new Busch dishwasher!  It is very quiet and works fantastic!  I had a Samsung and this dishwasher is so much better. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Good so far
txt: Cleans dishes very well, very quiet and holds a lot especially when  top tray is used rather than silverware basket.  It was easy to install.   It does appear to run for a long time on some cycles but I do like the  auto opening door at the end of the cycle. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Quiet Excellence
txt:
We love this dishwasher. It is really quiet and loaded with features.

The third rack is a huge improvement over the door or bottom rack baskets for utensils. It frees up more space for other dishes and they come out clean all the time. No more rewashing utensils. The adjustability of the other racks is very convenient. We are able to make every dish fit and we are able to use the space more efficiently. The AutoAir feature is great. Having the door automatically open when it is finished helps the dishes dry faster.

Did I mention it is quiet? We can run the dishwasher at anytime without affecting anyone in the house. Our last dishwasher sounded like there was construction going on in the kitchen. I sometimes forget this dishwasher is running until I see the red light on the floor. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Love this dishwasher!
txt: I'd never had a Bosch dishwasher until we moved into a 20 yo home that had what was possibly a 20 yo Bosch. Even on its last leg it cleaned better that any dishwasher I'd ever had, so when it finally gave out we had to replace it with another Bosch! This one cleans even better, has so much room, and dries better than the older model. I love the auto-air feature that pops open the door at the end of the cycle, and also the third rack for cutlery! It's definitely exceeded my expectations. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: New dishwasher
txt: Always heard Bosch appliances were good so once my 10 year old kitchenaid dishwasher died I invested in the Bosch and what a difference it is. So  quite if it wasn't for the little red light on the floor you might not know if it on. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Bosch diswasher

Very good product
I am very happy so far with that addition to my kitchen [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Great machine
txt: We purchased this dishwasher in December 2019. After about 1 week the track for the upper basket broke well it took the repair company about 3 weeks to come back with the results:wrong track!!!new order another couple of weeks waiting and now they are supposed to come back next week to hopefully get it done. Other than that, the machine works great [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

txt: I love this dishwasher. Does excellent job of cleaning and is super quiet! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Love It
txt: I purchased this dishwasher prior to Christmas.  It is quiet in fact if it were not for the light to indicate it is washing, i would not even know it was cleaning my dishes. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Dishwasher review
txt: Quiet, does a gooj job. Everthing you want from A dishwasher. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Superb!
txt: We could not be more pleased with our new dishwasher! Great use of space, cleans great, runs very quietly! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Outstanding Dishwasher
txt:
It has never been easier to wash dishes.  No pre-rinsing is required at all, even though I had my doubts about this feature at the beginning.  Our dishes have never looked cleaner than they do with this machine.  It shows that we definitely needed to replace the old machine.  The glasses literally sparkle.  And it is extremely quiet.  The only noise comes from the drain when the water is expelled.  
The only complaint is that there is no way to tell if the dishes are dirty or clean.  If the machine is running, there is a light on the floor, but otherwise no indication at all from the dishwasher which is a major fault. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Cool Beans for Clean!
txt: Sleek, sophisticated and does the job; love the third tray.  A reliable machine... [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Excellent product
txt: Replaced my Electrolux with this Bosch.  What a difference. Cleans much better and very quiet. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: New Dishwasher
txt: After 13 years of listening to a loud GE dishwasher I was ready to get a new one. I did a lot of research and shopping around before we decided on a Bosch. I love my new dishwasher. It holds so much more then my last dishwasher I don't have to run it as much. It uses less water and I can have it running at night while we are watching tv and not hear it. It cleans all of our dirty dishes with stuck on food that has been sitting for a few days. If you are thinking about getting a new dishwasher this is the one for you. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Great dishwasher!
txt: It does an excellent job...and is so quiet! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Truth in advertising
txt: This is everything they said it is: quiet, energy efficient and cleans well. It's an attractive unit. I agree with Consumer reports it's a good purchase.

title: So quite!!!
txt: I bought this dishwasher for my parents. There old one was loud and did not clean the dishes at all. This Bosch is absolutely fantastic. It cleans the dishes like nobody's business. It took a little getting used to the air drying aspect, but I will take air drying and having wicked clean dishes over element drying with dirty dishes. And this machine is superbly quite. It's so nice to actually hear the TV without having to crank the volume up to hear it, because the dishwasher is too loud. Also the room in this dishwasher is outstanding. We are able to put so much more in this dishwasher than the old one. Pots that would have never fit in the old dishwasher, fit perfectly fine in this one. Hands down this is my favorite dishwasher. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Great washer. Important installation issue.
txt: We're very pleased with our washer. We can set it to run when our electricity plan is cheapest. The auto-dry function allows room air to finish drying the load efficiently. Our only discovery is the need for a gap between the top of the unit and the underside of the counter to allow the auto dry motor to open the door. The installer did not know this, and it took 3 service calls for them to figure out this critical detail. Bosch may wish to better educate their installers and service technicians about this. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Perfect Dishwasjer
txt: Best Dishwasher we have ever owned.  It is so quiet that it really is indicative of the reason why Bosch installed a red light that shines on the floor to let the owner know that the dishwasher is running. Also love the ability to adjust the trays and the upper dinner ware tray is a  perfect addition. Should be first on a buyer's list of dishwashers to purchase. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Cleans Well, But.....
txt: This dishwasher cleans really well and is so quiet you don't even know it is running.  However, I did encounter one problem within the first two months of owning it.  I got an error message E24.  After looking it up I found out it has something to do with the drain being clogged and also found out that many other people who have this dishwasher have the same problem.  I looked at all of the lines and found no clog and took out the filter and found no clog.  I eventually took a plunger to the bottom drain and it finally got rid of the error message.  For a brand new dishwasher I am deeply disappointed in that this happened already.  I hope this isn't a sign of future problems.  Now I make sure there are no crumbs on the dishes before I put them in. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Happy to be in the Bosch Family
txt: I'm very satisfied with my dishwasher. I have had  other brands and they couldn't come close to the Bosch dishwasher. It is so smartly made. It is the quietest machine I ever had. If not for the red light, I wouldn't know it was on. I also have a Bosch geo thermal unit and that also is the best trouble free unit I've ever had and I had quite a few. The dishwasher cleans very well too. It's Bosch for me for now on. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Love the quiet
txt: With an open floor plan we wanted a very quiet dishwasher and that is what we bought.  Love that we can barely rinse the dishes and they always get clean. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Best Dishwasher I've Ever Used
txt: After having a baby a couple months ago, I was getting tired of my previous dishwasher. It was so loud, the design was flawed where the utensil basket was in the middle of the bottom shelf (this meant you couldn't fit large pots and pans into the dishwasher) and on top of it all, it didn't clean well. Well, this dishwash is definitely the best purchase we've made so far in the past year. It's so quiet that you cannot tell it's running. I love how modular the racks are, where you can raise and lower the middle rack. There's plenty of space for pots and pans, tall glasses, cups etc. I also love that I can run a half load. I would highly recommend this dishwasher for ANYONE who dirties dishes, namely everyone. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Great Machine
txt:
Best cleaning, most reliable dishwasher & best customer service ever. Best features include the top utensil rack (easy to organize which makes unloading a breeze), auto dry (brilliant and really works!), and spacing on lower rack, which works especially well with my dinner ware. 
Door is quite stiff and I cannot close it with my hip, so I wish I had gotten the protruding handle instead of the pocket handle. Annoying to have to push the off button in the morning after cycle runs. 
Lower rack could be greatly improved with 1 or 2 rows of vertical support spines along the right side since it is difficult to balance & support tall bottles and pitchers with the slanted spines. Glides on bottom rack would improve function and feel. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Very impressed!
txt: This dishwasher replaced an LG.  It is far superior and we thought the LG was good.  The instructions were well written and we were able to install it ourselves in about 4 hours.  Love the 3rd rack. This dishwasher is easier to load and cleans the dishes much better.  It's super quiet too.  We're so glad we switched to Bosch and highly recommend this model. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Dishwasher runs well
txt: Overall this is a great dishwasher.  It runs quiet cleans the dishes well.  Well made parts.  I would be nice to have more options for dish configuration on the lower rack. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: 2nd home 2nd Bosch
txt: We had a Bosch dishwasher in our last house. When we moved we had a GE dishwasher and it was terrible. We replaced it with a New Bosch as soon as we could [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Air Dry is the Best!
txt: This dishwasher cleans everything, as one would expect from a Bosch.  But the real bonus is the air dry feature.  It dries better than using heat and the best part is it's much friendlier to my plastic utensils and expensive kitchen appliance parts.  I'm putting my Cuisinart bowls and La Crueset in this dishwasher without hesitation -- and I'm using less energy.  I'm really glad I bought this dishwasher. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Drying
txt: Does not dry my plastics completely [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Quiet and washes 1st time
txt: I love the Quick 60 minute setting and when I set it in the evenings I love the auto dry cycle that opens the door automatically.  That is really fantastic for plastics.  No more wet containers & lids that have to drain further.  All round this is an amazing machine!!

title: It does what it claims!
txt: So we brought it after talking with several salespersons and all confirmed it was one of the best dishwashers on the market. This confirmed our research online. We have now had it for 6 months and we found it was living up to its repetition. We wanted one that would take care of food remains on the dishes and dispose of it, clean well, easy loading of dishes, clean every type of washable wear, dry well and we like it. It so far has lived up to its reputation. The machine has a good look and fell, easy to operate, even the husband can do it. So we are very pleased with the machine and we trust it will last more the 10 years, unlike our last one. I would highly recommend this machine. Nice work Bosch, keep it up. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Excellent Dishwasher
txt: This is an excellent dishwasher.  It is extremely quiet.  It gets the dishes very clean.  It's very deep and fits more dishes than our old dishwasher.  I also like the way the bottom rack is laid out.  It allows me to play "Dishwasher Tetris" when loading it really well by letting me place bulky pots, pans, and trays in a way that don't get in the way of the other dishes.  The only thing they can do better is with the red dot that shines on the floor to let you know it's running.  It would be nice if -- instead of just a red dot -- it displayed how much time left is in the cycle.  That's because when you close the door, all the controls are hidden.  You need SOMEthing visible outside the machine when it's running.  I highly recommend this dishwasher. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Bosch dishwasher
txt: I love love this dishwasher

title: Absolutely a superior machine
txt: it is quiet and the results are clean sparkling dishes and glassware. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Best. Thing. Ever.
txt: This is our second Bosch (the first was lost to thirsty rodents that prefer water pumps and drain lines). We had loved our 100 series but this one surpasses our expectations. The three adjustable racks have freed up so much space, which is key when you have a family of six. Everything comes out spotless as well. The auto air (door open) feature, although certainly gimmicky, is great and allows those hard to dry plastics and coffee mugs a bit of extra time. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Lean and clean
txt: This dish washer has brought life back to my dishes, glassware and pans. I love the quiet you get and the on light on the floor when it is running. I went from a black dishwasher to the stainless steel and it brightens my kitchen space with it's clean lines. The top silverware rack makes cleanup fun.

title: Quiet and efficient
txt: We love our new Bosch dishwasher. The dishes come out extremely clean. It is so quiet that the only way we know it's running, is by the light at the bottom.

title: Love our dishwasher
txt: Our silverware,glasses and dishes look brand new.  It is an amazing difference. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: 500 series dishwasher
txt: abloluty so satified can not find words this  good!!!!!!

title: Great dishwasher
txt: This dishwasher from Bosch does a really good job. The auto air feature works well in Assisting in drying. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Best ever
txt: I have never had a dishwasher that,cleaned my dishes so well and so quietly. I of course had a kink in operation but once that was cleared up, I couldn't be more pleased. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Best dishwasher ever!!!
txt:
I had another Top brand, top of their  line dishwasher in my new home that never got dishes clean. 
I thought I just had too high of expectations.
After doing dishes for the last year by hand, we got our Bosch. And let me telll you, it gets every challenging dish clean and dry!   For the first time in my life, I actually enjoy emptying the dishwasher!!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Great Dishwasher
txt:
So far so good except for the odor that seems to hang on after dishes are washed. Tried different cycles. Very quiet which is absolutely wonderful. 
Did not find the Bosch directions clear or very helpful. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: 500 Series Dishwasher
txt: Extremely quiet and provides very clean dishes. Good and simple display. Would suggest some way of knowing when dishes are finished beyond the buzzer. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Just the right model
txt: I thought the 500 Series had all the right features I needed, flexible with the adjustable racks, and definitely love the little drawer that I use for utensils. The air dry feature works great without issues. This is much better than my previous dishwasher. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Bosch 500 Series good overall
txt: This is our second bosch dishwasher. The added feature of the door opening is a nice touch that seems to dry the dishes better than the previous model we had. It seems to do an overall good job of cleaning the dishes as well. It's quiet and does it's job well. The upper third rack seems to hang down lower than the previous one we had and can make it diffuclt. So far so good and I would recommend it to others. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Works wonderfully, bigger than i thought
txt: Love it! So far everything gets clean.  ALL our dishes fit which is nice since we have weird ones: bowl-like giant plates, thick stoneware, plastic cereal bowl, everything fits. As a family of 5 we can go 2-3 days now between running it, too, which is a change from the daily cycle of our old maytag. Reasons I gave it a 4 vs 5: 1) its quiet but not super-quiet (the light to indicate it's on is ridiculous, you can hear it), 2) adding rinse aid is a pain to avoid 'air holes', 3) you have to manually 'power off' after running a cycle 4) you have to select 'auto air' each time you run it, which kids forget.  No major drawbacks, but little annoyances. Definitely would buy again. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Bosch 500 series dishwasher
txt: Very pleased with this appliance. Thoroughly cleans and is super quite. Multiple options for operation enable unit to handle all cleaning needs. Certainly a step above our last unit. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Happy with purchase
txt: Does a great job of washing the dishes [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Great Dish Washer
txt: We were in the market for a dish washer that could handle our household of 5 active people. Our old dish washer made us was our dishes over and over again. They never got clean. We researched what was the best machine out their and review and review Bosch kept coming up. We couldn't be happier with our new dish washer. It's is so quite and keeps our dishes super clean and when we use auto air the dishes come out super dry. I do confident with this dish washer I was all my pots and pans. No harsh heating elements just natural warmth and natural drying. It a great product and would recommend this to anyone who would ask. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Mostly good
txt: Drying feature doesn't work as well as it should. Otherwise good. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Bosch dishwasher
txt: very quite, cleans very well, lacks drying efficency.  Lots of control options.  Works well [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Bosch 500 Dishwasher
txt: We have been very pleased with the operation of our dishwasher, which is even more quiet than our last Bosch.  The interior design has also been improved. I think the new engineering on the shelves allows us to pack more into the  dishwasher than ever before. In fact, it seems that sometimes we run out of dinnerware before the dishwasher is full. We very much enjoy this new model.

title: Believe in Bosch
txt: I have owned this dishwasher for two months and it is amazing.  My dishes have never been cleaner, shinier, or more dry.  The  spaciousness and detailed design allow me to load larger items and pots and pans.  The third rack is great.  I can organize my silverware and utensils.   It is so quiet when operating.   I wipe off the dishes with a paper towel, and load them.  No extra time spent with pre-washing.  It was worth every dollar.  I just love it, and am excited to share this review with others. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Cleans great BUT...
txt: I love how clean my dishes are after washing; however, the configuration of the racks is confounding. I can't fit my glasses and other containers easily--it's a struggle to load it up so that everything fits right. Because of this, the plastic containers always end up right side up and full of water. I want to love this machine, but I just can't. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Excellent machine
txt: Had it now for 3 months with no issues. Washes the dishes great. I do rinse my dishes before placing them inside the dishwasher so I imagine that helps but I believe no dishwasher can completely remove all particles off the dishes. Love it [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: So quiet
txt: We researched dishwashers for ages,and finally decided on this one....it's not the cheaper version,but we also couldn't spring for the most expensive. I love the adjustable rack,and the top rack is pretty useful for larger utensils and small items. However,I am glad we didn't have this when the kids were little.....I personally like the divided cutlery rack,it separates everything well,but it would be tricky for small hands that are learning to help. The best part is how lovely and quiet this is!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Great dishwasher
txt:
Works well,
Learning settings has taken some effort. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: The Best
txt: First dishwasher that actually clean dishes!

title: Best Dishwasher
txt: This dishwasher is by far the best one we have owned, we have owned multiple other brands and they do not compare to Bosch [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Top Notch
txt: We love it! Everything comes out spotless and crystal clear! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Great Dishwasher!
txt: Works wonderfully!  Ultra quiet and dishes are always clean.  Love it! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Pluses and minuses: my new dishwasher
txt: It's very quiet, and generally does a good cleaning job.  It takes a very long time when set at "auto" (when the machine's sensors determine how long to wash and rinse), "sanitize" (which heats the load more than normal), and "air" (opens the door and prolongs blowing in order to fully dry the dishes)--this setting takes 3 hours and 48 minutes.  It has no heating element, unlike my old Asko dishwasher, which in general (I believe) did a better job in less time. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: helpful kitchen product
txt: I purchased this dishwasher because the color co ordinated with my kitchen.  I was very happy with the finish because it does not show fingermarks. I had a houseful over the holidays and the dishwasher could accommodate my needs.  I recommend this dishwasher. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: A real Dishwasher !
txt: This is a real dishwasher, it washes dishes. No need for you to wash them first. Simple, quiet and does what it's supposed to do..... [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Bosch 500 Series dishwasher
txt: This dishwasher is fantastic. Completely quiet, gets dishes and glasses sparkling clean, great drier. Love the 3rd top rack for long utensils. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Dishes are always clean, roomy easy loading
txt: My second Bosch is as expected, the best dishwasher ever. Large plates fit well, glasses and cups shelf loads easily, and third shelf is convenient for long handled utensils. Use the sanitize setting for drying. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Totally pleased...
txt: So far so good...  We just purchased this new product and thoroughly like it.  Only issue is wet dishes after wash.  We're learning to figure out what needs to be done to allow for better drying.  But this truly is the best dishwasher we've owned. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Best dishwasher ever!
txt: This dishwasher exceeds my wildest expectations!  Everything come out spotless and no noise!!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Best dishwasher I’ve ever owned
txt: This dishwasher is the best. Tons of space, and if you you've never had the third rack for silverware, you'll love it. It's extremely quiet and washes so thoroughly I'm afraid to think about how unclean my previous dishwasher left our dishes! Our handyman was pleased with the ease of installation. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Really love it.
txt: We especially like the 3rd upper rack for silverware, etc.  Gives us more room below.  Cleans very well. Easy to operate. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Pretty good with some faults
txt: After combing through many reviews and ratings, I purchased this dishwasher to replace a KitchenAid with a dead motor. It was easy to install and It does a good job of cleaning the dishes but it doesn't dry as well as the KitchenAid. That's okay, it's not too bad. The real fault is in the rack design. Each dishwasher is a puzzle where you have to figure out the best way to stack your dishes, but this is a puzzle with missing peices in that the rack designs for both the bottom and top don't seem well conceived and it's very hard to get dishes and large pans in the same load. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Best dishwasher ever owned !
txt: This d/w is sooo quiet I have a hard time knowing it's running!! Thankfully it emits a red light near the bottom showing you it's on. Absolutely LOVE the compartments and how clean it leaves the dishes!!! Literally, squeaky clean. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: German engineering at its Best!
txt:
Dishes come out sparkling clean. I am mainly using the 'auto' function. But even the delicate cycle cleans set stains, so that was impressive. Didn't think I'd use the third rack on top but it actually frees up a lot of space in the silverwear compartment which is very nice. Adjusting the height of the second rack is simple and practical at times. 
The only thing I'd wish would be an option is for the silverwear compartment on the bottom rack to be movable. I'd love to be able to place it along the front for easy access. Just a thought though. Excellent machine. Love my Bosch! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Dishwasher review after 8 weeks
txt: This dishwasher has met all of my expectations. It is very quiet and cleans well. When the dishwasher is running or is ready to start, there is a red dot that is displayed on the floor. Lots of rack space with the third rack. Can also move the second rack up or down depending on the size of the dishes to be washed. Would buy again. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Outstanding
txt: Our salesperson highly recommended the Bosch and everything he said was accurate.  Superior cleaning ability.  Large capacity with the silverware tray.  So quiet.  Very pleased with our decision. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Bosch dishwasher
txt: This replaced a dishwasher that was only 4 months old. I thought I would replace with my white Bosch dishwasher with a stainless one but a different manufacturer. I was so disappointed in the quality of the other dishwasher that my husband replaced that one with a new Bosch stainless dishwasher. I learned a lesson.  Stick with the Bosch reputation. It's worth paying a few more dollars [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Best Gift to myself ever
txt:
I recently purchased the 500 series Bosch disnhwasher and I could not be happier with the machine.  I use the recommended products Quantum Finish and get great results.  This dishwasher is extremely quiet and the red light projection on the floor is a great feature.  Sometimes I forget it is running because it is so quiet.  I love that the door does not "drop down" when you open it.  The third drawer is awesome for small stuff - I use those little bowls for snacks And the top shelf is ideal. My dishes come out dry every time. No spots on glasses.  This machine delivers on all its features.  So glad I purchased it.  It looks so elegant in our kitchen. 
I would definitely recommend this machine.   I did a lot of research,reading reviews and comparisons among other brands and didn't hesitate in purchasing the Bosch 500 series.  I would definitely purchase other Bosch appliances [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Quality
txt: I prefer quality and this dishwasher is exactly that. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Washes really well! Get it!
txt:
Pros:
- The dishwasher washes very well, no prerinse required
- Super quiet

Cons:
- Does not dry dishes. This could be a good thing if you don't want the dishwasher to apply a ton of heat on your dishes (which should make them last longer).
- Cycles take a long time. This could be a good thing too since it's taking its time to get everything clean. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Amazing!
txt: Way better than expected. It is quiet efficient and easy to load. LOVE THE SILVERWARE DRAWER!! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

title: Awesome dishwasher
txt: This dishwasher is very quiet (indicates its on by a red light beaming on the floor) and does what is intended.  Its cleans dishes very well.  The interior is designed to accomodate a good amount of dishes and glass of all sizes.  And the exterioir is very sharp looking.  Its designed very well inside and out and highy recommended. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

txt: It looks nice and sleek and runs beautifully. Cleans well and is quiet!

title: This Bosch dishwasher lives up to every promise. It is...
txt: This Bosch dishwasher lives up to every promise. It is so quiet we can have a conversation or watch tv nearby with absolutely no distraction. We use the recommended detergent and rinse aid,scrape the food bits off, and even dried-on egg leaves no trace. AutoAir feature leaves dishes dry. Love it!!!

title: Dishwasher cleans very well, quiet and my favorite feature is...
txt: Dishwasher cleans very well, quiet and my favorite feature is the auto air the door opens at the end of the cycle.

title: Love it. Quiet, excellent cleaning though I only run the...
txt: Love it. Quiet, excellent cleaning though I only run the dishwasher every few days. Helpful options. Wish it came with a user's manual rather than having to look online. Bosch customer service was great, though. Representative immediately mailed a paper photocopy to me.

title: We installed it, which was straightforward. It seems to work just great for us, at least after th...
txt:
We installed it, which was straightforward. It seems to work just great for us, at least after the first month of owning it. It is so quiet as to be almost creepy---you just hear the water move about or an occasional moving pan. That is wonderful! 
We'll have to see how it holds up with our highly mineralized well water, of course. To date it cleans well, so long as we add vinegar to the rinse cycle.
Our one complaint is that the instructions are not in plain English but rather are done with pictorial "cartoons." Some folks like that; we don't. It would be very helpful to have some words, not just pictures that may or may not be clear.

title: love it
txt: Inlove my new freezer. Its the perfect size and the perfect price.

title: Nice dishwasher overall, but for this price point it does...
txt: Nice dishwasher overall, but for this price point it does feel a bit cheap. It’s not overall sturdy and the door doesn’t seem as high quality as you would expect.  Looks nice and is quiet. A lot of functionality. I am glad we bought it still, but it did not meet my expectations when we bought it based on the reviews and videos. My bad for not checking it out in person first.

title: No user manualNo heated drying option Need manual for loading...
txt: No user manualNo heated drying option Need manual for loading options

title: We purchased this dishwasher to replace a "builder grade" machine....
txt: We purchased this dishwasher to replace a "builder grade" machine. We are extremely happy with our purchase.  It's super quiet and cleans great and even without the heat dry setting on leaves our dishes pretty dry. We love the utensil drawer and use that instead of the tray. Great feature!

title: Well built with upgraded features over older dishwasher. Outstanding cleaning...
txt: Well built with upgraded features over older dishwasher. Outstanding cleaning performance!!

title: Great features on this dishwasher
txt:
I bought this dishwasher a couple months ago on the recommendation of the man who was trying to fix my old dishwasher and I am very glad I did. 
I read many reviews prior to buying and here are some thoughts.  
I always wash overnight as suggested so that everything dries well. 
I always use finish/jet dry for spot free
I read reviews of bad smells:  once a month add white vinegar to a dish less wash to keep fat cleared out of tubes (told to by repairman)
Once a month clean the bottom screen out. 
I leave slightly ajar all the time because there is water in the bottom screen and want to avoid funky smells people reported. So far so good. Of course it is very quiet too. 
I love the top rack for spatulas and I think the washer is laid out nicely. I would recommend it to everyone.

title: Wet Dishes No Matter What
txt: This is definitely a quiet dishwasher and is energy efficient. However, it has absolutely NO DRYING feature and the auto air setting makes no difference at all. I can run it with auto air in the evening and if I unload the next morning I must have a dishtowel handy, especially for the silverware. We replaced an inexpensive 13 year old contract grade dishwasher and the dishes are no cleaner than before. Very disappointed.

title: Oh how I wish I could return this dishwasher. My husband picked this out, not realizing that Bosc...
txt:
Oh how I wish I could return this dishwasher. My husband picked this out, not realizing that Bosch believes dishwashers don't need to have a dry feature. Seriously....who wants to dry dishes before putting them away, especially silverware.

I have tried every setting including the auto air feature which pops the door open. But, regardless of how much time passes, even overnight, the silverware is wet and so is most everything else. We are highly dissatisfied with this dishwasher!!!!
